summary: This document contains an email exchange involving Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence indicates a change in Epstein's availability, moving the proposed meeting date from October 8 to October 10, 2013.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and communicates about scheduling changes.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is involved in the email exchange regarding the meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the subject of the meeting being scheduled and is noted to be unavailable on the originally proposed date.

Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a professional relationship.

events.title: Proposed Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting was initially proposed for October 8, 2013, but was later rescheduled to October 10 due to Epstein's unavailability.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The meeting with Jeffrey Epstein was originally scheduled for October 8, 2013.
The meeting was rescheduled to October 10, 2013, due to Epstein's unavailability.
